IAudioPlayback.ixx

This file defines the published interface for audio playback.

IAudioFrame

Defines interface used to playback of audio

Module

import Audio.AudioPlay.IAudioPlayback;

IAudioPlayback

Defines interface used to playback of audio

Module

import Audio.AudioPlayback.IAudioPlayback;
